text: Vendegies-au-Bois is a commune in the Nord department in North France.INSEE commune file It is from Lille. From 2014 and 2019, its population has decreased by 2.2%. Its coat of arms are the same as Beaurainâ€™s coat of arms. Beaurain is also from Vendegies-au-Bois. == References == Category:Communes in Nord
